sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { AppContext } from '../App'; import { useContext } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; function Home() { const {setPagination, setCity} = useContext(AppContext) const navigate = useNavigate(); function previous() { setPagination((i) => (i -= 1)); navigate('/settings') // acsess to settings } function next() { setPagination((i) => (i += 1)); navigate('/babyplanner') } function submitLocationHandler(e){ e.preventDefault(); if ( e.target.citySelect.value == "Select your location" ) { alert("Please select location"); return; } const foundCity = e.target.citySelect.value { if (foundCity){ setCity(foundCity) navigate('/babysitters') return foundCity } } } return (
) } export default Home
